replies.body: Hi! Was wondering when can we expect to receive the 2000 RP? :)
Hey Essen, thanks for chasing this! It should go out tomorrow at the latest - thanks for chasing it up!

> [{quoted}](name=Achenar,realm=OCE,application-id=hIjvqaz6,discussion-id=XtPamaqz,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2018-06-27T23:20:49.270+0000)
>
> Hey Essen, thanks for chasing this! It should go out tomorrow at the latest - thanks for chasing it up!

Hi Achenar, thanks for getting back to me! I still haven't received my RP yet, should I be worried?

Just asking for future art events, was the file size I sent a bit big? I noticed now that the picture you've displayed here isn't the same resolution as the one I submitted which is fine!, I'm just curious :)

Hey Chikorita! I think when you click on the image in the boards post, the full-size version shooould appear - we've just got them smaller for visibility on the main post! But your image sizes have been fine, don't worry. :)

Congrats on the top 10! :D

maybe it's just on my end, when I click the image it does go bigger but its still not the resolution I submitted which is fine! When voting was out the image resolution in that gallery was perfect , it just seems to have changed here aha  (: No need to change it, just means you cant see pykes shopping list ; ) ahah

And thank you lots! I worked so hard on this entry, I'm glad people liked it.
